amendment.description: An amendment numbered 58 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to clarify the authority of FEC attorneys, including the General Counsel, to represent the FEC in actions before the Supreme Court.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Phillips amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A045) offered by Mr. Phillips.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Phillips amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.
